results.title: Activation of AMPK-PGC-1alpha pathway ameliorates peritoneal dialysis related peritoneal fibrosis in mice by enhancing mitochondrial biogenesis
results.text_hl: Therefore, we cannot conclude that the amelioration of @<m>DISEASE_Peritoneal_Fibrosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056627 @@@PF@@@ is completely due to @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-mediated mitochondrial biogenesis via @GENE_PPARGC1A @GENE_10891 @@@PGC-1alpha@@@ signaling.
